Datasets

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • Datasets.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage the input data set for the analysis Input format: numberOfSamples numberOfGenes Gene_1 Gene_2 ... Gene_n SampleName_1 ValueOf_1(Gene_1) ValueOf_1(Gene_2) ... ValueOf_1(Gene_n) SampleName_2 ValueOf_2(Gene_1) ValueOf_2(Gene_2) ... ValueOf_2(Gene_n) ... SampleName_n ValueOf_n(Gene_1) ValueOf_n(Gene_2) ... ValueOf_n(Gene_n)
    Author:
    rossi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean compacted
      if data set must be compacted (do not keep copies of the same genotype) or not
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> frequencies
      number of times a given genotype is present in the dataset (always 1 if data set is not compacted)
      private java.util.ArrayList<boolean[]> genotypes
      genotypes present in the data set
      private boolean initialized
      data set can read input only once
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> labels
      Genes names
      private int numberOfEntries
      number of genotypes present in the data set

      • shrink

        public void shrink(int thres)
            throws InvalidThresholdException
        Keeps in the dataset only the top mutated genes
        Parameters:
        thres - number of genes to be kept (increased in case of parity of occurrences
        Throws:
        InvalidThresholdException - if thres is not a positive number

        Parameters:
        mutationCountAndFrequency - genotypes REQUIRE sorted by binary number and number of mutations
